name: Mortgage rescue fraud; consumer education
text: §480E-2.5  Mortgage rescue fraud; consumer education.  The office of consumer protection shall educate consumers about abusive practices that may be committed against consumers who may be offered mortgage assistance relief services or who face property foreclosures, liens, or encumbrances, as appropriate. [L 2012, c 183, pt of §1; am L 2016, c 142, §4]
